pr_title: [BEAM-9577] Migrate PortablePipelineJarCreator to new artifact service.

timeline.message: [BEAM-9577] Migrate PortablePipelineJarCreator to new artifact service.

timeline.bodyText: Should we have wrapped this exception in a StatusException as well?
timeline.author: ibzib

replies.bodyText: onError will do its own wrapping (and there's not really a significaintly appropriate status to return here).
replies.author: robertwb
